alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:02PM CDT until August 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wichita County in west central Kansas... Southeastern Greeley County in west central Kansas... * Until 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/. * At 801 PM MDT/901 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Leoti, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball size hail 10 miles north of Leoti. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Wichita and southeastern Greeley Counties, including the following locations... Lydia. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
